src:
Selain ACL Putus, Ini Cedera Lain Dedik Setiawan
07 Nov 2019, 05:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dedik Setiawan angkat bicara soal cedera yang membuatnya bakal absen lama dari lapangan hijau. Selain ligamen ACL yang putus, menurut penyerang Arema FC tersebut, ada cedera lain yang ia derita.
"Selain ada ligamen ACL yang putus, ada ligamen lain yang kekuatannya tinggal sekitar 30 persen," ucap Dedik.
"Jadi, saat ini cedera ACL tersebut tidak terlalu terlihat. Dipakai berjalan dan jongkok pun tak terlihat. Namun, jika dibiarkan dan putus, tentu tidak bisa dipakai jongkok," sambungnya.
Cedera ini pun, menurut Dedik, berpengaruh pada bagian lain dari lututnya. Meniskusnya pun mengalami masalah, akibat lututnya tak stabil.
"Nah, lutut nggak stabil ini pengaruh dari kondisi ACL," tuturnya.
Sebelumnya, Dedik mengalami masalah di ligamen lutut kanannya. ACL pemain berusia 25 tahun ini putus.
Dedik sendiri sudah sempat kembali bermain usai absen. Bahkan, pada laga tunda pekan kelima Shopee Liga 1 musim 2019, kontra PSM Makassar, yang dihelat pada medio Oktober lalu, ia sukses mencetak gol.
Namun, usai pertandingan ini, cedera Dedik kambuh. Walhasil, ia dipulangkan ke Malang, dan harus absen pada dua laga tandang berikutnya, kontra Persipura Jayapura dan PS TIRA.
Dedik dijadwalkan akan menjalani operasi penggantian ACL di RS Persada Malang, Kamis (07/11) besok. Setelahnya, pemain berusia 25 tahun tersebut diprediksi bakal absen selama enam sampai sembilan bulan.

Bagaimana komentar Dedik soal proses pemulihan cedera, yang diprediksi bakal lama? Simak di bawah ini.
text:
Besides ACL Disconnect, This Is Another Injury Dedik Setiawan
Nov 7 2019, 05:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Dedik Setiawan spoke out about the injury that will make him long absent from the gridiron. In addition to the broken ACL ligament, according to the Arema FC attacker, there were other injuries he suffered.
"Besides the ACL ligament breaking, there are other ligaments whose strength is around 30 percent," Dedik said.
"So, at this time the ACL injury is not very visible. Used to walk and squat was not seen. However, if left unchecked, it certainly cannot be used squatting," he continued.
This injury, according to Dedik, affected other parts of his knee. The meniscus also has problems, due to unstable knee.
"Now, this unstable knee is influenced by the ACL condition," he said.
Previously, Dedik had problems in his right knee ligament. The 25-year-old ACL player broke up.
Dedik himself had once returned to play after missing. In fact, in the match postponed for the fifth week of the Shopee Liga 1 season 2019, contra PSM Makassar, which was held in mid-October, he successfully scored.
However, after this match, Dedik's injury recurred. As a result, he was sent back to Malang, and had to be absent in the next two away games, against Persipura Jayapura and PS TIRA.
Dedik is scheduled to undergo ACL replacement surgery at Persada Hospital Malang on Thursday (11/07) tomorrow. Afterwards, the 25-year-old player is predicted to be absent for six to nine months.

How about Dedik's comment about the injury recovery process, which is predicted to take a long time? See below.
